mapper.select: SELECT '리뷰' AS cate , rtitle AS title, rregdate AS regdate, rno AS no, (SELECT CONCAT(mname, ' (', memail, ')') FROM members WHERE r.mno = mno) AS name, '-' AS isReply FROM review AS r UNION ALL SELECT '문의', qtitle, qregdate, qno, (SELECT CONCAT(mname, ' (', memail, ')') from members where q1.mno = mno), IF((EXISTS(SELECT * FROM qna AS q2 WHERE q1.q_gno = q2.q_gno AND q2.q_ono > 0)), 'O', 'X') FROM qna AS q1 WHERE q_ono = 0 UNION ALL SELECT '공지', ntitle, nregdate, nno, '관리자', '-' FROM notice AS n ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT 0, 5

SELECT i.ono AS no, CONCAT(m.mname, ' (', m.memail, ')') AS name, SUM(ol_count * ol_price) AS price, odate AS date, o_state AS state FROM orderinfo AS i JOIN orderlist AS l ON i.ono = l.ono JOIN members m ON i.mno = m.mno GROUP BY i.ono ORDER BY odate DESC LIMIT 0, 5
SELECT pno AS no, pname AS name, pcount AS count FROM product ORDER BY pcount LIMIT 0, 5

SELECT YEAR(odate) AS year, MONTH(odate) AS month, SUM(ol_count * ol_price) AS price FROM orderinfo AS i JOIN orderlist AS l ON i.ono=l.ono GROUP BY YEAR(odate), MONTH(odate) ORDER BY year DESC, month DESC LIMIT 0, 5
